claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.
explanation: A table listing influenza vaccine products by trade name and manufacturer, presentation, age indication, HA content per dose (μg HA per strain or virus count for LAIV4), administration route, and presence of mercury. Evidence: Flublok Quadrivalent (recombinant HA vaccine) is listed as containing 45 μg/0.5 mL HA per strain, whereas Fluad Quadrivalent (an IIV4) is listed as containing 15 μg/0.5 mL HA per strain. The table explicitly shows Flublok contains 45 μg HA per strain versus 15 μg HA per strain in a standard-dose IIV4, which supports the claim
